H0.text: Which city is the home of the Palais du Luxembourg. Lyon

H1.text: Which city is the home of the Palais du Luxembourg. Marseille

H2.text: Which city is the home of the Palais du Luxembourg. Bordeaux

H3.text: Which city is the home of the Palais du Luxembourg. Paříž

A4.text: The Luxembourg Palace is at 15 Rue de Vaugirard in the 6th arrondissement of Paris, France.
